Package com.kicas.rp.data

Class PlayerSession

java.lang.Object
com.kicas.rp.data.PlayerSession
public class PlayerSession extends Object
Stores transient data for a given player.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    PlayerSession.PlayerRegionAction
    Represents the actions players can be doing regarding regions.

  • Method Details

    • getUuid

      public UUID getUuid()
      Returns:
      the UUID of the associated player.

    • getClaimBlocks

      public int getClaimBlocks()
      Returns:
      the number of claim blocks the associated player has.

    • addClaimBlocks

      public void addClaimBlocks(double amount)
      Adds the given number of claim blocks (or partial claim blocks) to the associated player's claim block count.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of blocks to add.

    • subtractClaimBlocks

      public void subtractClaimBlocks(int amount)
      Subtracts the given number of claim blocks (or partial claim blocks) from the associated player's claim block count.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of blocks to subtract.

    • setRegionHighlighter

      public void setRegionHighlighter(RegionHighlighter highlighter)
      Removes the current highlighter and replaces it with the new, given highlighter. If the given highlighter is not null, then it is activated and the client-side block changes are sent.
      Parameters:
      highlighter - the region highlighter.

    • getAction

      public PlayerSession.PlayerRegionAction getAction()
      Returns:
      the current region action the player is performing, or null if no action is currently being performed.

    • setAction

      public void setAction(PlayerSession.PlayerRegionAction action)
      Sets the player's region action to the given value.
      Parameters:
      action - the region action.
      See Also:
      • Region Actions

    • getCurrentSelectedRegion

      public Region getCurrentSelectedRegion()
      Returns:
      the player's current selected region, or null if no region is currently selected.

    • setCurrentSelectedRegion

      public void setCurrentSelectedRegion(Region region)
      Sets the player's current selected region to the given region.
      Parameters:
      region - the selected region.

    • getLastClickedBlock

      public org.bukkit.Location getLastClickedBlock()
      Returns:
      the player's last clicked block.

    • setLastClickedBlock

      public void setLastClickedBlock(org.bukkit.Location lastClickedBlock)
      Sets the player's last clicked block to the given location.
      Parameters:
      lastClickedBlock - the last clicked block.

    • endRegionAction

      public void endRegionAction()
      Sets the player's region action, current selected region, and last clicked block to null.

    • isInAdminRegionMode

      public boolean isInAdminRegionMode()
      Returns:
      true if the player is in admin region mode, false otherwise.

    • setInAdminRegionMode

      public void setInAdminRegionMode(boolean inAdminRegionMode)
      Sets whether or not the associated player is in administrative region mode, which allows them to create admin-owned regions.
      Parameters:
      inAdminRegionMode - whether or not the player is in admin-region mode.

    • isIgnoringTrust

      public boolean isIgnoringTrust()
      Returns:
      true if the player is ignoring the trust flag restrictions, false otherwise.

    • setIgnoringTrust

      public void setIgnoringTrust(boolean ignoringTrust)
      Sets whether or not the associated player is ignoring the trust flag, which also makes them the effective owner of every region.
      Parameters:
      ignoringTrust - whether or not the player is ignoring the trust flag.
